name: skewbald
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an animal, especially a horse) having large white and brown-coloured areas of hair on its body: Fiona has a skewbald horse. The ponies were all piebald or skewbald with vivid white patches.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was riding a prettily marked skewbald Shetland pony.At her side was the mare's skewbald brown and white foal.

an animal, especially a horse, that has large white and brown-coloured areas of hair on its body: Fiona's horse is a skewbald. The breeder has been trying to produce a skewbald with enough quality to pass as a racehorse for some years. Compare
bay
piebald
pinto
palomino
roan
Danielrao/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesIn the story, one little skewbald rescues his herd from the frozen winter.
